Item.comments: use with onBeforeGet on CAD ItemType
Item.method_code:
' called onBeforeGet ' must be used in conjunction with method "Show CAD Grid Icons" ' 'System.Diagnostics.Debugger.Break()
Dim thisItem As XmlElement = Me.dom.SelectSingleNode("//Item") Dim selectStr As String = thisItem.GetAttribute("select")
If Not (selectStr.Equals("*") Or selectStr.Equals("")) Then If selectStr.indexOf("has_change_pending ") < 0 Or selectStr.indexOf("has_change_pending,") < 0 Then selectStr = selectStr & ",has_change_pending" thisItem.SetAttribute("select", selectStr) End If
Item.name: Select CAD Grid Icon Props
